Adrenaline.effect: Use at the start of a round. During this round, apply +5 Health to each of your WOOKIES.

Advance Warning.effect: Use during your activation. You and an adjacent friendly figure each gain 1 movement point.

Against the Odds.effect: Use at the end of a round. If your opponent has at least 8 more VPs than you, choose up to 3 of your figures. Those figures become Focused.

All in a Day's Work.effect: Use after you resolve a Special or Interact during your activation to become Focused and perform 1 additional action.

Ambush.effect: Use when an attack targeting you is declared. If you share an edge or corner with a space containing blocking, impassable, or difficult terrain, interrupt to move 4 spaces to a space adjacent to the attacker, then the attacker suffers 2 Damage.

Apex Predator.effect: Use during your activation to become focused, Hidden, gain 2 Power Tokens, and 2 movement points. The next time a hostile figure within 2 spaces is defeated during this activation, recover 2 Damage.

Arcing Shot.effect: Use before you declare an attack. You may target a figure or object adjacent to an empty space in your line of sight.

Armed Escort.effect: Use during your activation. During this round, other friendly figures within 2 spaces of you gain +1 Evade.

Assassinate.effect: Use while attacking a figure. If this is the first Command card you play during this attack, apply +3 Hits to the attack results. You cannot play other Command cards during this attack.

Balancing Force.effect: Use at the start of a round if your affiliation is Rebel. Each player chooses up to 3 figures. Roll 1 red die. Each of those figures recovers Damage equal to the Hit results.

Ballistics Matrix.effect:
Use during your activation. Place this card on your Deployment card as an Attachment.
----------------
Attachment: Exhaust this card before you declare an attack. Figures do not block line of sight during this attack.

Battle Scars.effect: Use during your activation to get 1 Power Token. If you have suffered 3 or more Damage, gain 2 Power Tokens instead.

Battlefield Awareness.effect: Use after another friendly figure within 3 spaces rolls any number of dice to reroll 1 of those dice.

Beatdown.effect: Use during your activation. During your group's activation, apply +1 Hit to the attack results of the next 2 attacks performed by friendly figures.

Behind Enemy Lines.effect: Use during your activation while in your opponents deployment zone to look at the top 3 cards of their Command deck and return those cards in any order.

Black Market Prices.effect: Special Action: Draw 2 Command cards. Then discard 1 card from your hand. You gain VPs equal to the cost of the discarded card.

Bladestorm.effect: Use while attacking to apply +1 Surge to the attack results. After the attack resolves, each hostile figure within 2 spaces of you suffers 1 Damage.

Blaze of Glory.effect: Use after an activation resolves to ready your Deployment card. At the end of this round, you suffer 3 Damage.

Blend In.effect:
Place this card on your Deployment card at the start of a round. It is now an Attachment.

Attachment: You cannot be the target of an attack. Discard this card at the end of your activation or when you declare an attack.

Blitz.effect: Use while attacking to apply +1 Surge to the attack results.

Blood Feud.effect: Special Action: Place this card on a hostile Deployment card. When an attack targeting a figure in that group is declared, apply +1 Hit to the attack results.

Bodyguard.effect: Use when an attack targeting an adjacent friendly figure is declared. If you could be the target of the attack, the attack targets you instead.

Brace for Impact.effect: Use while defending to add 1 black die to your defense pool.

Brace Yourself.effect: Use when an attack targeting you is declared. if it is not the attackers activation, apply +2 Block to the defense results.

Built on Hope.effect:
Use during your activation to look at the top 3 cards of your Command deck. Place 1 of them into your hand and the others on the top of bottom of your Command deck in any order.

Passive: When this card is discarded from your Command deck, re-draw it.

Burst Fire.effect: Special Action: Perform an attack. If the target suffers 1 or more Damage, each figure adjacent to the target space is Stunned.

Cal's Buddy.effect: Use during your activation to deploy the BD-1 Companion figure to your space or an adjacent space. For the rest of the mission, it activates at the start or end of your activation.

Call the Vanguard.effect: Use at the start of a round. A friendly TROOPER with a figure cost of 4 or greater may interrupt to perform a move and an attack.

Camouflage.effect: Use when an attack targeting you is declared. You become Hidden.

Capitalize.effect:
Use while attacking to choose 1 die. The player that rolled that die must reroll that die.

Passive (Discard Pile): When a hostile figure with a HARMFUL condition gains another HARMFUL condition, you may re-draw this card.

Capture the Weary.effect: Special Action: Choose an adjacent hostile figure. That figure becomes Weakened. If that figure was already Weakened, it suffers 2 Strain instead.

Cavalry Charge.effect: Use at the start of a round. During this round, you gain +1 Block, and while a friendly TROOPER within 3 spaces is attacking, apply +1 Hit to the attack results.

Celebration.effect: Use after a unique hostile figure is defeated to gain 4 VPs.

Change of Plans.effect: Use after you resolve a group's activation. Exhaust 1 of your Deployment cards to ready 1 other Deployment card of equal or lower Deployment cost that shares at least 1 trait.

Chaotic Force.effect: Use at the start of a round if your affiliation is SCUM. Each player chooses up to 3 figures. Roll 1 green die. Each of those figures suffers Strain equal to the Accuracy result.

Cheat to Win.effect: Use when you use "Gambit", after rolling the new die. You may change that die's result to another result of your choice on that die.

Choose a Side.effect:
Use during your activation. During this round, other friendly Mobile figures gain the following abilities based on your army affiliation: 
SCUM: "Personal Combat Shield"
IMPERIAL: "Gar Saxon's Flamethrower"

Cloned Reinforcements.effect: Special Action: Choose a defeated friendly non-DROID, non-unique TROOPER with a figure cost of 4 or less and place it in an empty adjacent space.

Close and Personal.effect:
Use during your activation to move up to 2 spaces. Then perform a melee attack without using an action using 1 red and 1 yellow die. The attack uses only the following abilities:
- Pierce 1
- Surge: +1 Hit
- Surge: Stun

Close the Gap.effect: Use at the start of a round. Each friendly BRAWLER may move up to 2 spaces. Then each friendly BRAWLER within 4 spaces of a hostile figure gains 1 Armor Token.

Collateral Damage.effect: Use after you resolve an attack. Choose a figure or object other than the defender within 2 spaces of the target space. That figure or object suffers 2 Damage.

Collect Intel.effect: Use at the start of a round if you have 1 or more SPIES on the map. Look at your opponent's hand of Command cards.

Combat Resupply.effect: Use during your activation. Distribute Hit tokens equal to the current round number to friendly figures within 3 spaces.

Comm Disruption.effect: Use when a Command card with a cost of X is played, where X is equal to or less than the number of friendly SPY groups on the map. Discard that card and cancel is effects.

Concentrated Fire.effect: Use when another friendly TROOPER declares an attack targeting a target in your line of sight. If you have the Ranged attack type, add 1 red die to the attack pool. You become Stunned.

Coordinated Attack.effect: Special Action: You and a friendly figure within 3 spaces may each perform an attack targeting the same figure. Figures do not block line of sight for these attacks.

Corrupting Force.effect: Use at the start of a round if your affiliation is IMPERIAL. Each player chooses up to 3 figures. Roll 1 blue die. Each of those figures suffers Damage equal to the Hit results.

Counter Attack.effect: Use after an attack targeting you is resolved. If you were not defeated and are adjacent to the attacker, the attacker suffers 2 Damage.

Covering Fire.effect:
Use at the start of the round. Up to 3 friendly TROOPERS become Hidden. During this round, each of your TROOPERS gains: 

- Surge: Stun. If the target was already stunned, apply +2 Hits to the attack results.

Cripple.effect: Special Action: Choose an adjacent hostile figure. Until the end of the round, that figure cannot voluntarily exit its space.

Cruel Strike.effect:
Special Action: Perform an an attack. This attack gains:

- Surge: Pierce 1, Weaken

Crush.effect: Use when you end your movement in spaces that contain one or more other figures. Choose one of those figures that is SMALL. That figure suffers 4 Damage.

Cut Lines.effect: Use at the start of a Status Phase. Players cannot draw Command cards during this round.

Dangerous Bargains.effect: Use at the start of a round if you have 30 or fewer VPs. You and your opponent each gain 3 VPs.

Dangerous Prey.effect: Use after an attack targeting you resolves. If you are within 4 spaces of the attacker, the attacker suffers 1 Damage (3 Damage if you are adjacent). Then, move up to 2 spaces.

Dark Energy.effect: Use during your activation. Choose another SMALL figure within 3 spaces. Push that figure up to 1 space, then it suffers 1 Damage.

Data Theft.effect: Special Action: Choose a Command card in your opponent's discard pile. Once during this round, you may play that card as though it was in your hand.

De Wanna Wanga.effect:
Choose 1 Command card in your discard pile and shuffle it into your Command deck.

Passive: Once per round, when this card is discarded from your hand or deck, you may shuffle it into your Command deck.

Deadeye.effect: Use while attacking to apply +2 Accuracy to the attack results.

Deadly Precision.effect: Use at the start of your activation. While attacking during this round, apply -1 Dodge to the defense results.

Deathblow.effect: Use when you declare a Melee attack to apply +1 Hit to the attack results. If the defender has the Ranged attack type, apply an additional +1 Hit to the attack results.

Debts Repaid.effect: Use when a friendly figure is defeated. Ready your Deployment card and become Focused.

Definition: 'Love'.effect: Use during your activation to perform an attack targeting a hostile figure 5 or more spaces away without spending an action. Remove 1 red die from the attack pool.

Deflection.effect: Use when a Ranged attack targeting you is declared. Apply -2 Accuracy to the attack results. After the attack is resolved, if you did not suffer any Damage, the attacker suffers 2 Damage.

Demoralizing Monologue.effect: Use while attacking to choose and reroll 1 defense die. Then you may reveal your hand. If you reveal 2 or more cards this way, remove the chosen die's results from the defense results.

Deploy the Garrison.effect: Use at the start of a round. Each friendly TROOPER or GUARDIAN within 4 spaces gains 2 movement points or 1 Hit Token.

Desperate Escape.effect:
Use at the end of the round to move up to 6 spaces.

Passive: At the end of the round, if your Kuiil is defeated, you may discard this card from your hand to distribute 2 Hit Tokens among friendly figures.

Devotion.effect: Special Action: Choose an adjacent friendly figure. Then, search your Command deck and draw 1 card with that figure's name as a trait, reveal it, and then shuffle your Command deck.

Dirty Trick.effect: Use when a hostile figure enters an adjacent space. That figure must choose to either suffer 3 Strain or become Stunned.

Disable.effect: Special Action: Choose an adjacent hostile figure. Until the end of the round, that figure cannot use Surge abilities or Special actions.

Disarm.effect: Use when an adjacent hostile figure becomes Bleeding from your attack. Put this card into play, then that figure suffers 1 Damage, becomes Weakened, and can't discard the Weakened condition.

Disengage.effect: Use when a hostile figure enters a space within 3 spaces of you to gain 3 movement points.

Disorient.effect: Use after a hostile figure with a BENEFICIAL condition suffers Damage. Discard 1 BENEFICIAL condition from that figure. Then, that figure suffers 2 Strain.

Double or Nothing.effect: Use while attacking to choose a die. That die's controller rerolls it. If the rerolled result has the same number of symbols as the original roll, you may double or cancel its results.

Draw!.effect: Use during your activation to perform an attack without using an action.

Droid Mastery.effect: Use during your activation. J4X-7 becomes Focused, then may interrupt to perform an attack. If it is not in play, put J4X-7 into play in your space instead.

Dying Lunge.effect: Use when you have suffered Damage equal to your Health, before you are defeated. Move up to 2 spaces, then perform a Melee attack. Then, you are defeated.

Eerie Visage.effect: Special Action: Each hostile figure with line of sight to you suffers 1 Strain and becomes Weakened.

Efficient Travel.effect: Use at the start of a round. Until the end of the round, each of your figures ignores additional movement point costs for difficult terrain and hostile figures.

Element of Surprise.effect: Use when you declare an attack. If the target figure did not have line of sight to you at the start of your activation, remove 1 die from its defense pool.

Elusive.effect: Use while defending to choose 1 attack die and remove all symbols on the chosen die from the attack results. Then, remove all symbols on a defense die from the defense results.

Emergency Aid.effect: Special Action: Choose an adjacent figure. That figure recovers 2 Damage. If you are a GUARDIAN or LEADER, that figure recovers an additional 1 Damage.

Endless Reserves.effect: Special Action: Choose a defeated friendly TROOPER and place it in an empty space adjacent to another figure in its group. Then, shuffle this card back into your Command deck.

Escalating Hostility.effect: Use after you resolve an attack that did not miss. The defender suffers 1 Strain , plus an additional 1 Strain for each other "Escalating Hostility" Command card in your discard pile.

Espionage Mastery.effect: Use after you resolve "Interrogate." Return your discarded Command card to your hand. Then, draw 1 card.

Etiquette and Protocol.effect: Special Action: Choose 1 hostile and 1 friendly figure, both in your line of sight. Until the end of the round, these figures cannot declare attacks targeting each other.

Evacuate.effect: Choose a friendly figure within 2 spaces. That figure is defeated. Your opponent gains only half the VPs they would normally gain (rounded down).

Explosive Weaponry.effect: Use when you declare an attack. This attack gains Blast 1.

Expose Weakness.effect: Use during your activation to choose an adjacent hostile figure. The next attack targeting that figure gains Pierce 3.

Extra Protection.effect: Use when another friendly figure within 2 spaces suffers 3 or more Damage. Move up to 2 spaces, then perform an attack.

Face Me!.effect: Special Action: Choose a unique hostile figure with line of sight to you. Push that figure a number of spaces equal to its speed to a space adjacent to you, then perform an attack targeting that figure.

Face to Face.effect: Special Action: Move up to 2 spaces, then perform an attack targeting an adjacent figure or object.

Fatal Deception.effect: Use at the start of your activation. When you use "False Orders" this round, you may choose a figure with a figure cost of 5 or less within 5 spaces.

Feint.effect: Use while attacking a figure within 2 spaces. Choose 1 attack die and 1 defense die and remove their results from the attack and defense results.

Feral Swipes.effect: Special Action: For each die in your attack pool, perform a Melee attack using 1 red die.

Ferocity.effect: Use at the end of the round. Choose 1 of your or 1 of your opponent's CREATURES. Perform 1 attack with that figure.

Field Promotion.effect: Use after you resolve an attack targeting a figure. If that figure has been defeated and your army affiliation is REBEL or IMPERIAL, you gain 4 VPs and increase your figure cost by 2.

Field Supply.effect: Use at the start of a round. Up to 2 other figures within 3 spaces of you gain 1 Hit Token or 1 Surge Token. During this round, a friendly figure who spends a Hit Token or a Surge Token may reroll 1 attack die during that attack.

Field Tactician.effect: Special Action: Choose a friendly figure within 2 spaces. That figure may interrupt to perform a move.

Final Stand.effect: Use when a friendly figure within 3 spaces has suffered damage equal to its Health, before it is defeated. Move up to 2 spaces, gain 1 Power Token, and then perform an attack. Then, that friendly figure is defeated.

Findsman Meditation.effect: Use at the start of a round to choose one of your opponent's groups. When your opponent activates that group during this round, you may interrupt to perform a move or an attack.

Fleet Footed.effect: Use during your activation to gain 1 movement point.

Fool Me Once.effect:
Cost: 2 Strain

Use during your activation to return your opponent's Command discard pile to the game box. Then, if you are a SPY, draw 1 Command card.

Forbidden Knowledge.effect: Use at the start of your activation to draw 1 Command card, then discard 1 or more Command cards from your hand. You recover 1 Damage, gain 1 movement point, and discard 1 HARMFUL condition for each card discarded.

Force Drain.effect: Special Action: Choose a hostile figure within 2 spaces. That figure suffers 3 Damage and becomes Stunned and Weakened. If that figure is a FORCE USER, you recover 3 Damage.

Force Illusion.effect: Use while a hostile figure in your line of sight is attacking. The defender becomes Hidden.

Force Jump.effect: Special Action: Move up to 5 spaces. During this movement, you gain MOBILE. You cannot end your movement in a space that contains blocking or impassable terrain.

Force Lightning.effect: Special Action: Choose a hostile figure in your line of sight within 2 spaces. That figure and each figure adjacent to it suffers 2 Damage and becomes Stunned.

Force Push.effect: Use during your activation. Choose another SMALL figure within 3 spaces. Push that figure up to 2 spaces.

Force Rush.effect: Use at the start of your activation. You gain 2 movement points.

Force Surge.effect: Use at the end of your activation to move up to 1 space. Then, choose an adjacent hostile figure. That figure suffers 2 Damage and 1 Strain.

Foresee.effect: Use during your activation to look at the top 2 Command cards of your opponent's deck and discard 1 of those cards. If its cost is 1 or less, draw 1 Command card.

Forward March.effect: Use during your activation. Each friendly figure within 2 spaces of you gains 1 movement point.

Fuel Upgrade.effect: Use at the start of a round. Until the end of the round, each of your VEHICLES gains +1 Speed and applies +1 Evade to its defense results.

Furious Charge.effect: Use after an attack targeting you resolves. If you suffered 3 or more Damage, ready your Deployment card.

Get Behind Me!.effect: Use when an attack is declared targeting another friendly small figure with a figure cost of 10 or less within 3 spaces. Move up to 3 spaces into a space adjacent to that figure that can be targeted by the attack. The attack targets you instead, if able.

Glory of the Kill.effect: Use after you resolve an attack targeting a figure. If the defender was defeated, recover 3 Damage.

Grenadier.effect: Special Action: Choose a space within 3 spaces and roll 1 red die. Each figure on or adjacent to the chosen space suffers Damage equal to the Hit results.

Grisly Contest.effect: Use during your activation. An adjacent hostile figure suffers 2 Damage. Then, you suffer 2 Strain.

Guardian Stance.effect: Use while an adjacent friendly figure is defending. Reroll 1 or more attack or defense dice.

Guerilla Warfare.effect: Use at the start of a round. Each friendly figure with no other friendly figures within 2 spaces gains 1 Block token and becomes Hidden.

Guild Programming.effect: Use when you perform "Rapid Fire". Before you declare each attack, you become Focused.

Hard to Hit.effect: Use while defending to reroll 1 defense die.

Harsh Environment.effect: Use at the start of a round. Until the end of the round, figures on exterior spaces apply -1 Evade to their defense results, and figures not on exterior spaces apply +1 Block to their defense results.

Heart of Freedom.effect: Use at the start of your activation to discard 1 HARMFUL condition, recover 2 Damage, and gain 2 movement points.

Heavy Armor.effect: Use while defending. During this attack, the Pierce keyword has no effect.

Heavy Ordnance.effect: Use while attacking to apply +1 Hit to the attack results. If the defender is an object, apply +2 Hit and Pierce 2 to the attack results instead.

Heightened Reflexes.effect: Use while attacking a figure to choose 1 defense die and remove its results from the defense results.

Hidden Trap.effect: Special Action: Choose a terminal. Each figure adjacent to that terminal suffers 2 Damage.

Hide in Plain Sight.effect: Special Action: Until the end of the round, you cannot be the target of an attack.

Hit and Run.effect: Special Action: Perform an attack. After the attack resolves, you gain 3 movement points.

Hold Ground.effect: Special Action: Until the end of the round, SMALL hostile figures cannot voluntarily exit spaces adjacent to you.

Honoring the Fallen.effect: Use when you declare an attack to apply +1 Hit to the attack results for each currently defeated friendly figure, to a maximum of +3 Hits.

Hostile Negotiation.effect: Use during your activation to discard a random Command card from your hand. If you do, your opponent discards 2 random cards from their hand.

Hour of Need.effect: Use during your activation. You recover Damage equal to the current round number.

Hunt Them Down.effect: Use when you declare "Lightsaber Throw". Apply +2 Accuracy to the attack results. The attack gains Cleave 2.

Hunter Protocol.effect: Use while attacking. You may trigger the same Surge ability up to twice.

I Can Feel It.effect:
(MULTIPLE TIMING WINDOWS)

Use while defending to reroll 1 defense die. 

Use while attacking to reroll 1 attack die. 

Special Action: Gain 1 VP.

I Make My Own Luck.effect: Use at the start of a round. Your player claims the initiative token, and Han Solo must activate first this round.

Iron Will.effect: Use when an attack targeting you is declared. You cannot suffer more than 3 Damage from that attack.

Jump Jets.effect: Special Action: Place your figure in an empty space within 5 spaces.

Jundland Terror.effect: Use at the end of a round to choose a "Tusken Raider" or "Bantha Rider" figure. The chosen figure gains 2 movement points and may interrupt to perform an attack or Special Action.

Just Business.effect: Use at the start of the round. During this round, friendly Scum figures gain 'Professional' while within 3 spaces of you. (Those figures may reroll 1 attack die while attacking.)

Karabast!.effect: Use during your activation. For each Damage you have suffered, you may choose a hostile figure within 2 spaces. Each chosen figure suffers 1 Damage.

Knowledge and Defense.effect:
Use while defending to add 1 black die to your defense pool.

Passive: While this card is in your discard pile, FORCE USERS  gain:
- Surge: Re-draw this card.

Learn by Example.effect: Play this card as a copy of a FORCE USER Command card in any discard pile, ignoring faction restrictions.

Let's Make a Deal.effect: Use while defending. Pay your opponent X VPs to apply -X Hits to the attack results. Then, you become Focused.

Lightbow.effect:
Special Action: Perform a Ranged attack using 1 blue, 1 red, and 1 green die. This attack uses only the following abilities: 
- +2 Accuracy
- Surge: +1 Hit
- Surge: Pierce 4

Lock On.effect: Use while attacking to apply +3 Accuracy, or -1 Dodge, or -1 Evade to the results.

Lure of the Dark Side.effect: Special Action: Choose a hostile figure in your line of sight. That figure gains +2 Hit Tokens, then perform an attack with that figure against a target within 4 spaces of the attacker. Then, the chosen figure suffers 2 Strain.

Negation.effect: Use after your opponent plays a Command card with a cost of 0. Discard that card and cancel its effects.

Marksman.effect: Use before declaring a Ranged attack. Figures do not block line of sight for this attack.

Ready Weapons.effect: Special Action: Distribute 3 Hit Tokens among figures in your group.

Size Advantage.effect: Special Action: Perform an attack targeting a SMALL figure. Apply +2 Hit to the attack results and the attack gains Weaken.

Smoke Grenade.effect: Special Action: Choose a space within 2 spaces. Place 1 energy shield in that space, then a friendly figure within 2 spaces of the chosen space gains 2 movement points. Discard that energy shield at the end of the next round.

Take Cover.effect: Special Action: During this round, while defending, apply +1 Block and -2 Accuracy to the results.

Take Initiative.effect: Use at the start of a round to claim the initiative token. Then exhaust 1 of your Deployment cards.

Urgency.effect: Special Action: Gain a number of movement points equal to your Speed +2.

Wookiee Rage.effect: Special Action: Choose an adjacent hostile figure. The chosen figure suffers 1 Damage for each Damage you have suffered, to a maximum of 3 Damage.

Mandalorian Tactics.effect:
Use during your activation to choose 1 of the following:
- Gain 4 movement points
- Perform an attack without spending an action

Maximum Firepower.effect: Special Action: Perform an attack. Apply +4 Hit to the attack results.

Meditation.effect: Special Action: You become Focused. Once during your next activation, if you are a FORCE USER, you may perform an attack targeting an adjacent figure without spending an action.

Opportunistic.effect: Use after a hostile figure suffers Damage. You gain 3 movement points.

Shoot the Messenger.effect: Use after you resolve an attack targeting a figure. If the defender was defeated, your opponent discards the top 3 cards of their Command deck.

I Must Go Alone.effect: Use at the start of a round. Until the end of the round, hostile figures cannot declare attacks targeting you unless they are within 3 spaces of you.

Improvised Weapons.effect: Special Action: Perform a Ranged attack using 1 green and 1 yellow die. You cannot use abilities during this attack.

In the Shadows.effect: Use at the start of a round. Until the end of the round, hostile figures 4 or more spaces away from you do not have line of sight to you. You do not block line of sight for those figures.

Induce Rage.effect: Use at the start of a round to choose up to 2 figures. Each of those figures discards each of its conditions, then gains 1 Hit Token for each condition discarded this way.

Inspiring Speech.effect: Special Action: Choose up to 2 friendly figures adjacent to you. Those figures become Focused.

Intelligence Leak.effect: Use during your activation to look at your opponent's hand. You may choose and discard a Command card from it. Then, you suffer Strain equal to that card's cost.

Looking for a Fight.effect: Use during your activation to gain 1 Hit Token. Then, either move up to 1 space or push an adjacent SMALL figure up to 1 space.

Lord of the Sith.effect: Use when a hostile figure is defeated to interrupt to move up to 2 spaces. Then, you may use "Force Choke" or perform an attack.

Mandalorian Steel.effect: Use at the start of the round. During this round, after an attack resolves targeting a friendly figure, if that figure spent a Block Token during that attack, it recovers 1 Damage.

Marked Territory.effect: Use during your activation to gain 1 Power Token. Then, a figure in your group in an exterior space gains 1 Power Token.

Master Operative.effect: Use when you declare "Close Quarters." You become Focused. Apply +1 Surge to the attack results.

Merciless.effect: Special Action: Choose an adjacent hostile figure. That figure's player may discard 2 cards from the top of his Command deck. If he does not, your player gains 3 VPs.

Miracle Worker.effect: Use when a friendly figure within 3 spaces of you has suffered damage equal to its Health. Instead of being defeated, it recovers 3 damage.

Mitigate.effect: Use while attacking to reroll 1 attack die.

Navigation Upgrade.effect:
Special Action: Take 1 Strain. Place this card in your Play Area. (i.e. in your discord Player Area channel)
----------------
Attachment: Exhaust this card during a friendly DROID's activation. That figure gains 1 movement point.

New Orders.effect: Special Action: Choose 1 adjacent friendly figure. Ready that figure's Deployment card.

No Cheating.effect: Use at the start of the activation of a hostile figure in your line of sight. During this round, that figure's attack becomes Melee, and when it declares an attack, it removes one attack die from its attack pool.

Of No Importance.effect: Use when one of your non-unique figures is defeated. That figure is worth 4 fewer VPs, to a minimum of 0.

Officer's Training.effect: Use while attacking to reroll 1 attack die. Then, if you are a LEADER, draw 1 Command card.

On a Mission.effect: Special Action: Move up to 5 spaces. Each time you enter a space containing a SMALL figure, you may push that figure 1 space.

On the Lam.effect: Use when an attack targeting you is declared to perform a move.

One in a Million.effect: Use when you declare an attack. If it is not your activation, remove all dice from the target's defense pool.

Optimal Bombardment.effect: Special Action: Choose up to 3 VEHICLES, DROIDS, or HEAVY WEAPONS adjacent to you. Each of these figures may interrupt to perform an attack. Each attack gains Blast 1.

Out of Time.effect: Use during your activation. A hostile figure within 3 spaces and line of sight suffers Strain equal to the current round number.

Overcharged Weapons.effect: Use when a hostile figure activates to interrupt to perform an attack targeting that figure. The attack gains Pierce 2. Then, exhaust your Deployment card and become Weakened.

Overdrive.effect: Use at the start of a round. During this round, each of your DROIDS may suffer 2 Damage during its activation to perform 1 additional action. Limit once per DROID.

Overheated.effect: Special Action: Strain 4. If you have the Ranged attack type, perform 2 attacks. Apply -1 Hit to the attack results during these attacks. Then, your attack type becomes Melee.

Overrun.effect: Use at the start of your activation. During this activation, when you enter a hostile figure's space, that figure suffers 2 Damage. Limit once per hostile figure.

Overwhelming Impact.effect: Use while attacking. For each defense die rolled, apply +1 Damage and +1 Surge to the attack results. During this attack, ignore all defense results that are not on the defense dice.

Pack Alpha.effect: Special Action: Up to 3 friendly CREATURES within 3 spaces each move up to 3 spaces. Then, choose a hostile figure. It suffers Damage equal to the number of those figures adjacent to it.

Paid in Beskar.effect: Use when a hostile figure within 3 spaces is defeated to gain 2 Block tokens.

Parry.effect: Use while defending to apply +1 Block or +1 Evade to the defense results.

Parting Blow.effect: Interrupt when a hostile figure exits an adjacent space. Before that figure moves, perform an attack targeting that figure. Then, you become Stunned.

Payback.effect: Use after an attack targeting you resolves to interrupt to perform an attack targeting the attacker. Apply +2 Surge to the attack results.

Personal Energy Shield.effect: Use during your activation to gain 1 Evade Token. While defending during this round, apply +1 Block to your defense results for each Evade result.

Pickpocket.effect: Use during your activation while adjacent to a hostile figure to roll 1 green die. Your opponent loses VPs and you gain VPs equal to the Accuracy result.

Planning.effect: Special Action: Draw 2 Command cards. Then, if you are not a LEADER, discard 1 of those cards.

Positioning Advantage.effect: Use while attacking to apply +1 Hit to the attack results.

Prepared for Battle.effect: Use during your activation to gain 1 Hit Token and 1 Block Token. Then, if you are a LEADER, an adjacent friendly figure gains 1 Hit Token and 1 Block Token.

Preservation Protocol.effect: Use when you have suffered Damage equal to your Health. Instead of being defeated, recover 1 Damage. Until the end of the game, you lose 'Programming Override' and 'Shared Intuition'.

Price of Glory.effect: Use during your activation to discard 1 HARMFUL condition and gain 2 movement points. Then, you may suffer 1 Damage to gain up to 2 different Power Tokens.

Price on Their Heads.effect: Special Action: Place this card on a hostile Deployment card. When the last figure in that group is defeated, gain an additional 4 VPs.

Primary Target.effect: Use when you declare an attack targeting a hostile figure with the highest figure cost of all hostile figures on the map. You become Focused and apply +1 Hit to the attack results.

Protect the Old Ways.effect: Use while a figure within 3 spaces is defending to apply +X Block to the defense results, where X is 1 plus the number of FORCE USER Command cards in your discard pile.

Provoke.effect: Use after you resolve an activation to choose a hostile figure adjacent to one of your TROOPERS or GUARDIANS. That figure's group must activate next if able.

Pummel.effect: Special Action: If you have the MELEE attack type, perform 2 attacks.

Rally.effect: Use at the start of your activation to discard all of your HARMFUL conditions.

Rally the Troops.effect: Special Action: Choose another friendly TROOPER within 3 spaces. Ready that figure's Deployment card.

Rank and File.effect: Use at the start of your activation. You and each friendly TROOPER adjacent to you gain 1 movement point.

Rapid Recalibration.effect: Use while attacking, before the defender performs rerolls. Choose 1 attack die and turn that die to any side.

Reactive Loyalties.effect:
Use after an attack targeting you resolves. Perform 1 of the following based on your affiliation: 

- IMPERIAL: The attacker suffers 3 Damage
- SCUM: You gain 3 VPs
- REBEL:  You recover 3 Damage

Rebel Graffiti.effect: Use at the end of your activation, if there are no adjacent hostile figures, to gain 2 VPs. Then, if you are "Sabine Wren", you may re-draw this card.

Reduce to Rubble.effect: Use after you resolve an attack that did not miss due to accuracy. Each figure and object within 2 spaces of the target space suffers 1 Damage. Then, place a Rubble token in the target space and each adjacent space.

Regroup.effect: Special Action: Discard all HARMFUL conditions from adjacent friendly figures.

Reinforcements.effect: Use at the start of a round. Choose 1 of your defeated TROOPERS that has a reinforcement cost of 3 or less. Place that figure adjacent to any other figure of its group.

Repair.effect:
If you a are TECHNICIAN, you may use this card during your activation without spending an action.

Special Action: Choose an adjacent friendly DROID or VEHICLE. That figure recovers 3 damage.
Free Action (TECHNICIAN): Choose an adjacent friendly DROID or VEHICLE. That figure recovers 3 damage.

Reposition.effect: Special Action: Choose a SMALL friendly figure within 3 spaces. Push that figure up to 3 spaces.

Rest in Peace.effect:
Put this card into play at the start of a round.

Players cannot choose, play, or re-draw Command cards in discard piles.

At the end of the round, discard this card and draw 1 Command card.

Retaliation.effect: Use when a friendly figure is defeated to either become Focused, gain 2 Hit Tokens, or move up to 2 spaces.

Reverse Engineer.effect: Special Action: Perform an attack. During this attack, you may use abilities on the defender's Deployment card instead of your own. Apply +1 Surge to the attack results.

Right Back At Ya!.effect: Use when an attack targeting you is declared. The attacker suffers 1 Damage (3 Damage if you spent a Block Token during this attack).

Roar.effect: Special Action: If you have suffered 3 or more damage, choose up to 3 adjacent hostile figures. Those figures become Stunned.

Run for Cover.effect: Use when an attack targeting you is declared. Choose 1 die and remove it from the attack pool.

Sarlacc Sweep.effect: Special Action: Perform 2 attacks. Each attack must target a different figure.

Savage Vigor.effect: Use when an attack targeting you is declared. The attacker chooses 2 attack dice and removes the rest from the attack pool.

Second Chance.effect:
Place this card on your Deployment card at the start of a round as an Attachment.

Attachment: Before you would be defeated, or at the end of this round, recover 2 Damage and discard this card.

Self-Augmentation.effect:
Use during your activation to place this card on your Deployment card as an Attachment.

Attachment: You gain the DROID trait. While attacking, you may reroll one attack die.

Self-Defense.effect: Use when a hostile figure enters a space adjacent to you. That figure suffers 1 Damage.

Set a Trap.effect: Use at the start of a round and choose a map tile. At the end of the round, choose one of your figures on that tile to interrupt to perform an attack targeting a hostile figure on that tile.

Set for Stun.effect: Special Action: Perform an attack. If the target would suffer 1 or more Damage, reduce the Damage suffered to 0. Then, the target becomes Stunned.

Set the Charges.effect: Special Action: Choose a space within 3 spaces and roll a blue die. Open any unlocked doors adjacent to that space. Then, each figure or object on or adjacent to that space suffers Damage equal to the combined Hit and Surge results.

Shadow Ops.effect: Special Action: Until the end of the round, the opposing player cannot play Command cards.

Shared Experience.effect:
Use during your activation. Spend 3 movement points to become Focused. 

Passive (Discard): When a friendly DROID or VEHICLE is defeated, you may re-draw this card.

Signal Jammer.effect:
Put this card into play at the start of a round. (Play area in your discord channel)

------

When any player plays a Command card, discard that card and cancel its effects. Then, discard this card.

Single Purpose.effect: Use at the start of your activation. You may use the same special action up to twice during this activation.

Sit Tight.effect: Use at the start of a round. You do not activate any groups this round until you have more ready Deployment cards than your opponent.

Slippery Target.effect: Use when a hostile figure enters an adjacent space. Gain movement points equal to your Speed.

Smuggled Supplies.effect: Use at the start of your activation to recover 2 Damage, apply +1 Surge to your attack results until the end of the round, or apply +1 Evade to your defense results until the end of the round.

Smuggler's Tricks.effect: Special Action: Choose a tile or token you are on or adjacent to. Until the start of the next round, your opponent counts as having 1 fewer figure on or adjacent to that tile or token.

Sniper Configuration.effect: Special Action: Perform an attack. You may draw line of sight from any friendly figure, but still measure range from this figure. Apply +2 Accuracy and Pierce 2 to the attack results.

Son of Skywalker.effect: After a figure resolves an activation, ready your Deployment card.

Spinning Kick.effect: Use while attacking. This attack gains Cleave 1 and Cleave 2.

Squad Swarm.effect: Use after activating a group. You may immediately activate another ready group with the same name. The combined cost of both groups cannot exceed 15.

Stall for Time.effect: Use at the start of a round. Your opponent places 1 random Command card from his hand on top of his Command deck.

Static Pulse.effect: Special Action: For each hostile figure adjacent to a friendly 'Dio,' you may have that figure suffer 2 Strain or become Weakened. If 'Dio' is not in play, put 'Dio' into play in your space instead.

Stay Down.effect: Use after resolving "Close and Personal." If the target was not defeated, perform an additional attack with the same target. Then, you become Stunned.

Stealth Tactics.effect: Use while defending to add 1 white die to your defense pool.

Still Faster Than You.effect: Use at the start of a hostile figure's activation to interrupt to move 2 spaces and perform an attack targeting a different hostile figure.

Stimulants.effect: Special Action: You or an adjacent figure suffers 1 Damage, then gains 1 movement point and becomes Focused.

Strategic Shift.effect: Special Action: A player of your choice shuffles his hand of Command cards into his deck. Then, that player draws 2 cards.

Strength in Numbers.effect: Use after you resolve a group's activation. You may immediately activate another group. The combined deployment cost of these groups cannot exceed 12.

Stroke of Brilliance.effect: Use when an attack targeting you is declared. Apply +2 Block and +1 Evade to the defense results.

Supercharge.effect: Special Action: Perform an attack. As you roll dice, add yellow dice to the attack pool until there are 4 attack dice total. After the attack resolves, you suffer Strain equal to the number of dice added this way.

Support Specialist.effect: Special Action: Choose a friendly DROID, TECHNICIAN, or TROOPER within 3 spaces. That figure interrupts to perform an action.

Survival Instincts.effect: Use at the start of your activation. Until the end of the round, apply +1 Block and +1 Evade to your defense results.

Take it Down.effect: Special Action: Choose an adjacent friendly figure. That figure performs an attack. Apply +2 Hits to the attack results.

Take Position.effect: Use during your activation. During this round, apply +1 Block to your defense results and you cannot be pushed, except by MASSIVE figures.

Targeting Network.effect:
Use while attacking to reroll 1 attack die. 

Passive (Discard pile): While this card is in your discard pile, your DROIDS gain: 
- Surge: Re-draw this card.

Telekinetic Throw.effect: Special Action: Choose a hostile figure in your line of sight within 3 spaces. Roll 2 blue dice. That figure suffers Damage equal to the Hit results.

Terminal Network.effect: Special Action: Use while adjacent to a terminal. Until the start of the next round, you gain control of all terminals, regardless of which figures are adjacent to them.

Terminal Protocol.effect: Roll 1 green die. Each other figure and object in or adjacent to your space suffers Damage equal to the Damage results. Then, you are defeated.

There is Another.effect: Use at the start of a round. Draw 1 Command card. During this round, you may play Command cards whose restriction matches the name of another FORCE USER Deployment card in your army.

There Is No Try.effect: Use when a friendly REBEL FORCE USER within 4 spaces rolls any number of dice. Choose one of those dice and turn it to any other side. On that die, convert each Dodge result to 2 Blocks and 1 Evade.

To the Limit.effect: Use after you resolve a Special Action during your activation to perform 1 additional action. Then you become Stunned.

Tools for the Job.effect: Use when you declare an attack to add 1 attack die of your choice to the attack pool.

Tough Luck.effect: Use after your opponent rerolls a die. Remove that die's result from the results.

Toxic Dart.effect: Use during your activation. A hostile figure within 3 spaces and in line of sight suffers 1 Strain and becomes Weakened.

Trandoshan Terror.effect: Use when you declare "Indiscriminate Fire". Add 1 yellow die to the dice pool.

Transmit the Plans.effect: Special Action: Distribute 2 Hit Tokens among friendly figures. If you are adjacent to a terminal, gain 2 VPs.

Triangulate.effect: Special Action: Up to 3 friendly DROIDS each move up to 1 space. Then choose a hostile figure within 5 spaces and line of sight. It suffers Damage equal to the number of those friendly DROIDS who have line of sight to it.

Unlimited Power.effect: Use when you use "Emperor." You may choose any other friendly figure on the map instead of another friendly figure within 4 spaces.

Utinni!.effect:
Use at the start of a round. During this round, each friendly Jawa Scavenger gains +1 Speed, +1 Accuracy, and 
- Surge: If you are attacking a figure, gain 1 VP.

Vanish.effect: Special Action: You cannot suffer Damage or receive conditions until your next activation. At the start of your next activation, gain 4 movement points.

Veteran Instincts.effect: Use during your activation to gain 1 Hit Token or Surge Token. Then, gain 1 Block Token or Evade Token.

Whistling Birds.effect: Special Action: Move up to 2 spaces, then choose up to 3 figures within 2 spaces and roll 1 red die. Each of those figures suffers Damage equal to the Hit results.

Wild Attack.effect: Use when you declare an attack. Add 1 red die to the attack pool and 1 white die to the defense pool.

Wild Fire.effect: Use when you declare an attack. remove up to 2 dice of your choice from the defense pool.

Wild Fury.effect: Use during your activation. You become Focused and may perform multiple attacks during this activation. At the end of your activation, become Stunned and Bleeding.

Windfall.effect: Use when a Command card is discarded from your hand or deck. You gain VPs equal to that card's cost. When this card is discarded from your hand or deck, gain 1 VP.

Worth Every Credit.effect: Use during your activation to discard 1 HARMFUL condition and gain 2 movement points. When the next hostile figure is defeated during this activation, gain 2 VPs.

Wreak Vengeance.effect: Use when you use 'Dual-Bladed Fury.' You may choose both effects instead of only 1.

You Will Not Deny Me.effect:
When this card is discarded, place it on your 'Fifth Brother' Deployment card.

You cannot be defeated. You ignore your Harmful conditions.

When a hostile figure is defeated, recover 2 Damage and return this card to the game box.
